import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./AddMovieForm.css"; const AddMovieForm = ({onAddMovie}) => { const [formData, serFormData] = useState({ title: "", year: "", image: "", genre: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { const {name,value} = e.target; serFormData({ ...formData, [name]:value, }) }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onAddMovie(formData); } return (
